about_us_digital-publishing.title: About site
about_us_digital-publishing.text1: On this website, you can explore a rich tapestry of Turkish culinary delights.
about_us_digital-publishing.text2: Discover authentic recipes, learn about the cultural significance of dishes, embark on a flavorful journey through the heart of Turkey's food traditions, and even contribute by sharing your own articles and culinary experiences.

history.title: Mission & Vission
history.decText: Our website's mission is to be a premier source of information on Turkish cuisine, inspiring and educating our visitors. We aim not only to share unique recipes and culinary secrets from Turkey but also to bring a cultural and historical dimension to the world of culinary exploration.

history.title: Bunzo History
history.decText: Many years ago, in sunny Istanbul, a group of passionate culinary enthusiasts gathered in a cozy restaurant to share their experiences with local dishes and discuss how they could share this culinary discovery with the rest of the world. Their passion for cuisine was infectious, and it sparked the idea for our website dedicated to Turkish cuisine.
